name: iauro Systems Pvt Ltd
description:
iauro systems Pvt ltd started in early 2009. iauro team has extensive experience in following domains – • Mobile • Cloud • BigData Description iauro Systems Pvt ltd focuses on Mobile, Cloud and BigData domains. iauro has delivered projects from single line of concept to finished market ready products.
Our core expertise includes - iOS development Android development Hybrid Application development - HTML5 and native mobile SDK NoSQL solutions - MongoDB, Redis, HBase, MemBase BigData Analytics solutions - Hadoop, HIVE, PIG Query Optimization and very large RDBMS
Specialties iPhone development, iPad development, Android development, mobile apps development, Cloud Computing, Data Analytics, Hadoop, NoSQL, Map Reduce, MongoDB, Redis
